

## Widgets #

## Graphs widgets #

## Layout #

## Popups & Modal windows #

## Columns #
> Basic
    Without border:
--------------------------------
    Item 0 Item 1 Item 2
    Item 3 Item 4 Item 5
    Item 6 Item 7 Item 8
    Item 9 Item 10 Item 11
    Item 12 Item 13
--------------------------------
    With border:
--------------------------------
    ID Name Path Flags
--------------------------------
    0000 One /path/one ....
    0001 Two /path/two ....
    0002 Three /path/three ....
--------------------------------
> Mixed items
--------------------------------
    Hello
    Banana ImGui
    Apple
    1.000 - + red
    An extra line here. Sailor
    Corniflower
    1.000 - + blue
    
    ## Category A # 
    ## Category B # 
    ## Category C #
--------------------------------
> Word-wrapping
--------------------------------
    The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
    Hello Left The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
    Hello Right
--------------------------------
> Borders
    [x] horizontal [x] vertical
--------------------------------
    aaa bbb ccc ddd
    eee fff ggg hhh
--------------------------------
> Tree within single cell (?)
--------------------------------
    > Hello
        Sailor > Bonjour
        Marin
--------------------------------

## Keyboard, Mouse & Focus #
